widget.name: Events
widget.preload: time_check = Time.now.utc.midnight - 1.month locals[:events] = Roxiware::Event.order("start ASC").select{|event| event.end_time > time_check} Roxiware::Event.where("start >= :start_date", :start_date=>Time.now.utc.midnight).order("start ASC").limit(locals[:events_count]) locals[:events].present?
widget.render_view:
<% if events.present? %>
<%= link_to("", events_path, :class=>"events_widget_title") %> <% events.each do |event| %> <%= link_to (events_path, :anchor => "event-#{ event.id }", :id=> "event-#{event.id}", :class=>"event_widget_event") do %>
<%= event.title %>
<%= # generate the date range string show_date = event.start.strftime(@event_date_format) end_time = event.end_time if ((event.start.day != end_time.day) || (event.start.month != end_time.month) || (event.start.year != end_time.year)) show_date += " - " + end_time.strftime(@event_date_format) end raw show_date %>
<% if (event.duration_units != "days") || (event.start_time != "12:00 AM") %><%= event.start.strftime("%l:%M %p") %><% end %> <% if !(event.city.blank? && event.state.blank?) %>
<%= event.city unless event.city.blank? %><%= ", " + event.state unless event.state.blank? %>
<% end %>
<%= event.location %>
<% end %> <% end %> <%= link_to("", events_path, :class=>"events_widget_all_events") %>
<% end %>
